extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a network defender?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Strong Password Policy and Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use a strong password policy and multifactor authentication to reduce the impact of password compromises.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems and Software Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure operating systems and productivity applications are up to date. Use the latest supported versions, apply security patches promptly, and use antivirus to guard against known malware threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Prevent and Detect Lateral Movement
extracted_playbook.description: Implement architectural controls for network segregation and protect management interfaces of critical operational systems. Use browse-down architecture to prevent attackers from gaining privileged access.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Up Security Monitoring Capability
extracted_playbook.description: Collect data needed to analyze network intrusions and review incident management processes.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Host-Based Intrusion Detection System
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy a host-based intrusion detection system to defend against various threats.
